subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Lackey, no stranger to the bright lights of October, helped St. Louis take a 2-1 lead in its N.L. division series, with Matt Carpenter and Kolten Wong contributing homers.
snippet: Lackey, no stranger to the bright lights of October, helped St. Louis take a 2-1 lead in its N.L. division series, with Matt Carpenter and Kolten Wong contributing homers.
